resources.string:
Help

Map Network : 
Input target machine/network address into search bar and choose an option from the top right menu
 _ In normal (ping) map, upon clicking a list item, the MAC address will be copied.(For filtering Sniff in Monitor Mode) A text file of legitimate MAC addresses can be supplied and a report generated when the last record is clicked after a normal scan.
 _ In OS map, upon clicking a list item, a redirection to a vulnerability search website will start.

Sniff packets :
Monitor Mode
 _ Start monitor mode in the menu on the top right. Filters can be set before starting sniff. Every session generates a pcap file.
Promiscuous Mode
 _ Start promiscuous mode in the menu on the top right. Filters can be set before starting sniff. Every session generates a pcap file.
Clear filter
 _ Clears currently set filters
Clear list
 _ Clears current screen of output.

Analyze PCAP :
 _ Generates a graph with a supplied pcap file depending on source (SRC) or destination (DST), each red line represents one unique address. Might be buggy with large PCAP files


Credits :
Binaries used :
 _ nexutil & libfakeioctl
 _ tcpdump
 _ nmap
 _ pcbin & pcmon

Nexus 5 rooted with CF-Auto-Root


SS18-2A UOW FYP
